about_the_game:
The official artbook of Alice VR, showcasing the incredible designs and ideas of artists from Carbon Studio.
It features 40 pages of beautiful concept graphics, rough sketches, 3D models, and notes from the creators.

Find out how the world of Alice VR was designed and brought to life!

You’ll find the artbook in your game's installation directory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
